Description_lang: Consecration lasts ${$s1/1000} sec longer and its damage is increased by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Consecration lasts 2 sec longer and its damage is increased by 20%.
description_blz.es_MX: Consagración dura 2 s más y su daño aumenta un 20%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Consagração dura 2 s a mais e tem o dano aumentado em 20%.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Weihe' hält 2 Sek. länger an und der Schaden des Effekts ist um 20% erhöht.
description_blz.en_GB: Consecration lasts 2 sec longer and its damage is increased by 20%.
description_blz.es_ES: Consagración dura 2 s más, y su daño aumenta un 20%.
description_blz.fr_FR: La durée de Consécration est augmentée de 2 s et ses dégâts de 20%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata di Consacrazione di 2 s e i danni che infligge del 20%.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Освящение" действует на 2 сек. дольше и наносит на 20% больше урона.
description_blz.zh_TW: 奉獻的持續時間延長2秒，且造成的傷害提高20%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 奉献的持续时间延长2秒，伤害提高20%。
